General.Name: Jiangsu Maixinlin Aviation Science & Technology Corp. A
General.Description: Jiangsu Maixinlin Aviation Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells aircraft, engine, landing gear, medium and large structural, precision steel parts, fasteners, and components in China. The company offers processing and testing equipment. Jiangsu Maixinlin Aviation Science and Technology Corp. was founded in 2010 and is based in Suzhou, China.
